General.Name: Vinte Viviendas Integrales S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Vinte Viviendas Integrales, S.A.B. de C.V. engages in the land acquisition, design, promotion, construction, urbanization, and commercialization of housing projects for families in Mexico. Vinte Viviendas Integrales, S.A.B. de C.V. was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Avenue Santa Fe 428, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 05349
